overview: Merrily skewering everyday Mafia life, this comical send-up chronicles the aptly named but dysfunctional Vendetta crime family, headed by short-fused hit man Sonny (Derek Diorio). It seems that bungling adopted son Paulie (Dan Lalande) has a habit of botching all the clan's plans, much to Sonny's consternation. Can the Vendettas overcome Paulie's incompetence and regain their standing atop the mob's pecking order?
title: Two's a Mob
